author: cms-tau-pog
body:
Dear colleagues, 

this is a backort of minor fixes and cleanups form 81X. the changes are very local and act only on the high level analysis and end-user part. The change in PhysicsTools/PatAlgos/python/tools/coreTools.py initiated the backport on an end-user request. 

Cheers,
Roger
title: backports of fixes and cleanups from CMSSW_8_1_X
